articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Student Football Match
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Student Football Match
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a student football match on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of Kim Il Sung University, the highest institution of Juche-based education and science.
					 There was the football match between teams of Kim Il Sung University and Pyongyang University of Railways that day, at which the former beat the latter 4-1.
					
					 After watching the match, Kim Jong Il congratulated the players on their good results, saying that the revolutionary and militant students in our country are good at art and sporting activities while devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm to the study of science for the country and the people.
					
					 He noted with great satisfaction that the above-said universities have produced a large number of able cadres and technical personnel for the nation who play a leading role in the revolution and construction, thus positively contributing to the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation, and highly praised the achievements made by them over the past years.
					
					 It is of weighty significance in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and building a rich and powerful nation to train the students who will shoulder the destiny of the country in the future to be able talents with ample knowledge and good physique, he said, advancing highly important tasks that should be regarded as guidelines in developing the intellectual and ideological education and sports at universities.
					
					 Accompanying him were First Vice Department Director Ri Jae Il and other leading officials of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and officials concerned.

articles.title: 1st Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Observed
articles.content:
1st Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Observed
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates an editorial to the first anniversary of the publication of the Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity.
					 Another historic inter-Korean summit took place in Pyongyang in October last year and the declaration was adopted there. This marked an important event as it made it possible to put the cause of national reunification at a new phase of development on the basis of the June 15 joint declaration, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 When the fellow countrymen were provided with a joint action programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration thanks to the adoption of the October 4 declaration, the hearts of all of them were burning with the desire for independent reunification. The declaration paved a wide avenue for developing the inter-Korean relations and achieving peace on the Korean Peninsula and common prosperity and reunification of the nation.
					
					 It serves as an immortal banner as it clearly indicates the way for the Korean nation to follow in its struggle for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, a great programme for reunification common to the nation, and signified a great stride forward in accomplishing the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The United States and the Lee Myung Bak group, its followers, are getting ever more desperate in their moves against the unity and reunification of the Korean nation, the editorial notes, and continues:
					
					 The U.S. has persistently pursued its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK in utter disregard of the desire and wishes of the Koreans for national reunification and staged ceaseless large-scale war exercises targeted against the DPRK in south Korea, straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Inter-Korean dialogues have been stopped and a check-bar dropped on the cooperation undertakings and inter-Korean relations are now at the lowest ebb due to the Lee group's treacherous acts of ignoring the historic inter-Korean declarations and refusing to implement them since the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The stand and attitude toward the above-said declarations are a touchstone to distinguish patriotism from treachery, peace from war and reunification from division.
					
					 The editorial calls on the Koreans to wage a dynamic struggle to put an end to the U.S. anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK which blocks their cause of independent reunification and gravely threatens the peace on the Korean Peninsula and check and foil traitor Lee Myung Bak's moves to establish a fascist dictatorial system and his moves for confrontation against reunification.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Suppression of Pro-Reunification Forces Denounced
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Suppression of Pro-Reunification Forces Denounced 
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement Saturday assailing the Lee Myung Bak group for intensifying the suppression of progressive pro-reunification movement forces these days. 
					 On Sept. 27 the group set in motion the "National Intelligence Service" and police to search 25 places including offices of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in Seoul, Pusan, Kwangju, Kyonggi Province, Jeju Island and other areas and the June 15 Publishing House, the June 15 School and the June 15 TV operated by the solidarity and confiscate documents.
					
					 This goes to prove that the Lee group's tyranny has entered an extremely dangerous phase to completely stamp out the progressive pro-reunification movement forces and revive fascist dictatorship in south Korea, the statement says, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee group claims that the praise and introduction of the Juche idea and the system in the north and the activities conducted by solidarity at the so-called "instruction from the north" are the main reasons for cracking down upon it. This, however, is sheer sophism and a very poor trick as their claim can not be any ground for incriminating them.
					
					 Their act of incriminating those who praise and disseminate the Juche idea which is followed by south Koreans as compatriots and recognized by the world can not but be interpreted as the most barbaric human rights abuses as it is aimed to stamp out the idea cherished by them.
					
					 The group is suppressing the massive anti-U.S. struggle and pro-reunification movement of south Koreans who rose up in demand of independent new policy and new life after branding them as activities conducted at the "instruction from the north." This is an intolerable insult and a mockery of the people.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the Lee group's suppression of progressive movement forces standing for reunification including the above-said solidarity is an undisguised fascist action to dampen the desire to achieve reunification through alliance with the north mounting in south Korea and justify their moves for inciting confrontation with the DPRK. They also prove once again that the group is made up of hysterics putting the erstwhile military dictators into the shade.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that if the group of traitors is allowed to stay in power, they will savagely trample down upon the movement for independent reunification and the fascist dictatorial system will revive in south Korea and the whole nation suffer disasters.

articles.title: KCNA Refutes S. Korean Conservative's Anti-DPRK Malarkey
articles.content:
KCNA Refutes S. Korean Conservative's Anti-DPRK Malarkey
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservatives' moves to push the north-south relations to the phase of acute confrontation have gone beyond the danger line.
					 A typical example is that So Jae Jin, director of the puppet Institute for Unification Studies, advocated the "uselessness" of the inter-Korean dialogue at a seminar held at Seoul National University on September 23.
					
					 The DPRK vehemently dismisses this as a total denial of the north-south dialogue and an open declaration of confrontation.
					
					 The north-south dialogue requires both sides to wipe out misunderstanding and mistrust and promote national unity by making concession and compromising with each other irrespective of differences.
					
					 Dialogue is necessary and meaningful only when both sides consider reunification as an urgent national task and take the option to achieve it peacefully, not by war.
					
					 So Jae Jin's rhetoric proves that he is an anti-reunification element keen on inciting confrontation in utter disregard of the country's reunification, not befitting his post as "director of the institute".
					
					 He even talked about "reform" and "opening".
					
					 There exist differing social systems in the north and the south at present. Neither side is willing to make a concession to the other side out of its own accord over the issue of social system. Therefore, if one side pressurizes the other side to make "opening" and "reform" it will naturally escalate confrontation.
					
					 This proves that the "reform" and "opening" touted by him are, in essence, no more than a version of "the call for unification by absorption" made by the successive anti-reunification elements only to drink a bitter cup.
					
					 The DPRK can never tolerate So's reckless remarks slandering the sacred political system in it and the Songun policy of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 The DPRK is a genuine popular masses-centered socialist system in which the working masses have become genuine masters of the state and society and everything of the society serves them. 
					
					 The great Songun policy is aimed at firmly protecting genuine socialism, mainstay of the people and their cradle, from the moves of all hues of enemies to invade and stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 This notwithstanding, he defamed the political system, the Songun politics in the DPRK this or that way. This casts doubt as to whether he is a human being with elementary thinking power, to say nothing of his qualification as "director of the unification institute".
					
					 It is not the first time that rhetoric defaming the political system in the DPRK was heard from among conservatives since the Lee Myung Bak group came to power in south Korea. But it was only So who let loose so malignant vituperation about the political system and the political mode and the single-minded unity in the DPRK. 
					
					 No wonder, even south Korean media noted with concern that his reckless remarks would mark an occasion of further bedeviling the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 So Jae Jin was marginalized in the June 15 era of reunification for being a political greenhorn and an imbecile bereft of any political philosophy or elementary ability to understand reality and a wicked anti-reunification element. However, he dared defame the political system in the DPRK. Lurking behind this is his sinister intention to maintain at any cost the post with small authority he managed to obtain with difficulty under the puppet Lee regime.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the DPRK can never tolerate the smear campaign against its supreme headquarters and the noble popular system absolutely trusted by all people.
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon anyone who slanders the dignified political system in the DPRK and insults the spiritual world of its people devotedly safeguarding their leader.

articles.title: KCNA Accuses Lee Myung Bak of Breaching October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
KCNA Accuses Lee Myung Bak of Breaching October 4 Declaration
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is driving the north-south relations to confrontation, totally refusing to implement the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, an action programme for its implementation.
					 The October 4 declaration comprehensively deals with all issues of developing the north-south relations and achieving the peace of the country and the prosperity common to the nation in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The Lee group, among other things, has seriously violated the spirit of "By our nation itself" enshrined in the October 4 declaration.
					
					 From the outset of its office it laid it down as its policy to settle the issues concerning the north-south relations with a "yardstick of pragmatism not with a yardstick of ideology."
					
					 It did not hesitate to let loose a string of rubbish terming the idea of "By our nation itself" "chauvinist nationalism" and "shaky nationalism."
					
					 These are very grave outbursts defaming the spirit cherished by all Koreans as an idea common to the nation irrespective of the ideology and system after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 It openly took up the cudgel against the October 4 declaration which deals with specific issues of boosting the multi-faceted cooperation and exchange between the north and the south for the prosperity common to the nation.
					
					 The puppet authorities laid down "four principles to govern the policy towards the north" at the outset of their office and opted to freeze the north-south relations that had favorably developed since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 They suspended the implementation of the October 4 declaration which enjoyed full support of all Koreans, complaining that it is not in line with "state interests" and talking about "economic propriety" and "financial burden."
					
					 They are openly justifying their opposition to the implementation of the declaration, asserting that it is "unreasonable to demand an  "unconditional implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration" and spreading undesirable stories that their implementation requires "staggering amount of funds."
					
					 It is an unpardonable separatist act to totally deny the successes achieved in the movement for the country's reunification and chill the Koreans' desire to independently settle the issue of reunification.
					
					 The south Korean regime has further escalated the military confrontation between the north and the south, thus challenging the October 4 declaration which clarifies realistic measures for removing the hurdles lying in the way of national reunification through dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 It introduced ultra-modern nuclear war hardware including a super-large nuclear-powered carrier and nuclear-powered submarines into south Korea and labeled compatriots in the north south Korea's "principal enemy."
					
					 It staged with outside forces joint military exercises Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian targeted against compatriots, turning south Korea into a theater of saber-rattling. 
					
					 The Lee group's military confrontation racket is so dangerous as to block the advance of the June 15 era of reunification by rendering the north-south relations extremely tense and start a war of aggression at any cost with outsiders.
					
					 The south Korean conservative group is now talking about "reconciliation and cooperation" between the north and the south, paying lip-service to "co-existence and co-prosperity."
					
					 Not long ago it made much fuss about "overall dialogue" in a bid to create impression that it is interested in improving the already strained north-south relations and developing cooperation and exchange.
					
					 But as the reality proves, it is seeking confrontation and tension, not the development of inter-Korean relations and peace and prosperity, and working with bloodshot eyes to stifle the DPRK in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 It is the Lee group of traitors that has frantically pursued the confrontation in ideology and system between the north and the south while calling for somebody's "change" and "improved human rights record."
					
					 It is busy with a wholesale purge of pro-reunification progressive forces in an effort to chill the people's desire to achieve reunification through an alliance with the north and stoke confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 All areas of south Korea are swept by the waves of suppression of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration, an organization for the movement of the reunification which has been active to implement the June 15 joint declaration after its publication.
					
					 The crackdown on the above-said solidarity only brought to light the intention of the Lee Myung Bak regime to liquidate the forces supporting the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and striving to implement them and thus bring the north-south relations and the declarations to collapse.
					
					 All this is directly linked with the south Korean puppet clique's treacherous moves for confrontation against reunification as it blocks the implementation of all agreements reached between the north and the south according to the historic declarations.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration have been fully proved as the most important documents for national reunification and nothing can replace them in the efforts to develop the north-south relations and achieve national reunification at present.
					
					 Had it sincerely met the requirements of the declarations, big successes would have been attained in the development of the inter-Korean relations and the movement for national reunification and the Koreans would have commonly benefited from them.
					
					 It is a serious crime against the nation and reunification that the Lee clique played down the historical weighty significance of the above-said declarations and refused to implement them. 
					
					The Lee regime will not be able to escape a stern judgment of history for having betrayed the nation.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Standing in Way of Implementing Oct. 4 Declaration
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Standing in Way of Implementing Oct. 4 Declaration
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- One year has passed since the publication of the October 4 Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity, but the work for its implementation has hardly made any progress, the inter-Korean relations have not developed but further deteriorated and there is no sign of their improvement.
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes this in a signed commentary carried on the occasion of the first anniversary of the declaration.
					
					 This is attributable to the fact that the Lee Myung Bak group adopted the "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" as its "policy towards the north" already before coming to power and have rushed headlong into sycophancy towards the U.S. and confrontation with compatriots since their seizure of power, disregarding and negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for its implementation, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 What has taken place in south Korea for the past one year teaches a serious lesson that it is impossible to improve and develop the inter-Korean relations as long as the traitors to the nation stay in power, backed by outside forces. Whoever stands for independent reunification, peace and prosperity should, therefore, resolutely turn out in the struggle against Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 How to approach the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration the north and the south pledged to implement before the nation serves as a barometer to distinguish the policy for independent reunification, peace and prosperity from the policy for confrontation and war. Accordingly, the October 4 declaration is not a document that allows one to dodge its implementation. Moreover, it is impossible to improve the inter-Korean relations in the future, too, if one ignores and negates any document as one pleases for the mere reason that it was signed by one's predecessor. 
					
					 The day is not far off when traitor Lee will face the nation's stern judgment for being hell-bent on sycophancy towards the U.S. and confrontation with compatriots in disregard of the above-said two declarations, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Implementation of October 4 Declaration Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of October 4 Declaration Called for
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The adoption of the declaration on October 4 in 2007 at the historic Pyongyang summit marked an event to be specially recorded in history as it provided an occasion to bring about a landmark turn in the movement for national reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun today observes this in a signed article carried on the occasion of the first anniversary of the publication of the Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity.
					
					 The October 4 declaration serves as a reunification programme common to the nation as it paved a wide avenue for all Koreans who love the country and the nation to bring earlier the reunification of the country, while promoting reconciliation, unity and cooperation under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il signed the historic October 4 declaration, thus indicating the most correct way of achieving independent reunification and peace and prosperity by the concerted efforts of the Koreans, and has provided energetic leadership for bringing about a victorious advance in the movement for national reunification. This is an undying feat performed by him in the history of the nation.
					
					 The declaration reflects the unanimous desire and wishes of all Koreans to achieve independent reunification and peace and prosperity by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is talking about "co-existence and co-prosperity" and "dialogue" but, in actuality, busy fanning up the atmosphere of the inter-Korean confrontation, slandering and negating the June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration which indicate a clear way for achieving national reunification and national prosperity.
					
					 The people from all walks of life in south Korea should intensify the struggle against Lee Myung Bak, bearing in mind that their life and future depend on the struggle for smashing the Lee group's anti-reunification racket for confrontation.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad will surely accomplish the historic desire for national reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans by holding fast to the above-mentioned declarations.

articles.title: Ground-Breaking Ceremony for Reconstruction of Rajin-Khasan Railways and Rajin Port Held
articles.content:
Ground-Breaking Ceremony for Reconstruction of Rajin-Khasan Railways and Rajin Port Held
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A ground-breaking ceremony for the reconstruction of Rajin-Khasan Railways and Rajin Port took place in front of the DPRK-Russia Friendship House in the area of Tumangang Railway Station in Rason City Saturday. 
					 Attending it were Minister of Railways Jon Kil Su, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kung Sok Ung, Vice-Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Myong San and others, officials in the field of railways, working people in the city, a delegation of the "Russian Railways" Company headed by its President V.I. Yakunin,  Governor of the Administration of Maritime Territory of the Russian Federation Sergei Darkin, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Aleksei Borodavkin, officials concerned with railways and other Russian guests, Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Valery Sukhinin and diplomatic envoys of different countries here. 
					
					 The president of the company said at the ceremony that the plan for the reconstruction of Rajin-Khasan railways, a result of the meeting of the top leaders of the two countries in 2001, has entered a phase of its implementation at last thanks to the positive cooperation of officials in the field of railways in the countries.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the experimental stage of the large project for connecting the Trans-Siberian Railroad with the Trans-Korean Railways is drawing the attention of different countries, he expressed the belief that the railway organs of the two countries would steadily boost the mutually beneficial cooperation in the future, too, to complete the project as quickly as possible. 
					
					 Jon Kil Su spoke next. 
					
					 He said that it was of weighty importance to hold the above-mentioned ceremony in the run-up to the 60th anniversary of the opening of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Russia. 
					
					 The railways between Rajin and Khasan will serve as a land transport route of friendship commonly contributing to economy and transport of the two countries and improving the welfare of the two peoples and, furthermore, they have a bright prospect of developing into an excellent international transport route for reliably ensuring the transport between Asia and Europe, he noted.
					
					 Aleksei Borodavkin and Sergei Darkin made congratulatory speeches at the ceremony. 
					
					 The inaugural work of laying composite railways took place and a monument to mark the ceremony was unveiled.  
					
					 The government of the DPRK hosted a reception on the above-said occasion on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Singapore Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Singapore Appointed
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Jong Song Il was appointed as DPRK ambassador e. p. to Singapore, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Korean Delegation Leaves for Mongolia
articles.content:
Korean Delegation Leaves for Mongolia
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A friendship delegation of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries headed by its Vice-Chairman Jon Yong Jin who is vice-chairman of the Korea-Mongolia Friendship Association left here today by train to visit Mongolia.
					 On the same day a delegation of the "Russian Railways" Company headed by its President V.I. Yakunin arrived in Rason by train to participate in the ground-breaking ceremony for the reconstruction of Rajin-Khasan railways and Rajin Port.
					
					 Arriving with the delegation were Governor of the Administration of Maritime Territory of the Russian Federation Sergei Darkin, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Aleksei Borodavkin, officials concerned with railways and other Russian guests.
					
					 They were greeted at Tumangang Railway Station by Jon Kil Su, minister of Railways, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and others and Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and diplomatic envoys of different countries.

articles.title: Party Founding Museum Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Party Founding Museum Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- A large number of servicepersons, people from all walks of life and youth and students in the DPRK are visiting the Party Founding Museum every day on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The museum has been visited by more than 3.7 million Korean people, overseas compatriots and foreign friends since it was opened to visitors in October of Juche 59 (1970).
					
					 Going round the historic relics and mementoes on display there, the visitors deeply grasped the undying feats and wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung who set a brilliant example in building a revolutionary party of Juche type and energetically guided the party building and activities.
					
					  Visiting the museum, many overseas Koreans and foreigners expressed profound reverence for the President and manifested the conviction that the WPK shining with its great history and tradition would demonstrate its might along with the century amid the full support of progressive mankind.

articles.title: Patriotic Life of Kim Ung U
articles.content:
Patriotic Life of Kim Ung U
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Today commemorates the 130th anniversary of the death of Kim Ung U, great grandfather of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The ardent patriotism of Kim Ung U who devotedly fought for the country and people is still kept in the minds of the Korean people.
					
					 He ardently loved the country and people and resolutely opposed feudal bureaucrats and foreign invaders.
					
					 He often told to villagers about the Korean people's history of struggle and beauty of mountains and rivers of the country to implant national pride in their hearts. And he said that the people would be well off only when they beat down the exploiters and invaders.
					
					 He with the lofty patriotic will positively aroused the people to the struggle against the reactionary bureaucrats and foreign aggressors and fought in the van.
					
					 When the U.S. imperialist aggressors' ship "General Sherman" sailed up the River Taedong and anchored at Turu Islet, he, together with some other villagers, collected ropes from all the houses and stretched them across the river between Konyu Islet and Mangyong Hill and then rolled stones into the river to block the way of the pirate ship.
					
					 Upon hearing the news that the invaders, throwing off the mask of "trade", had sailed up the river threatening and blackmailing Koreans and been engaged in espionage, murder and robbery, Kim Ung U rushed to the Walled City of Pyongyang at the head of the villagers.
					
					 And he saw to it that the people of the city, with the government army, loaded a lot of small boats with firewood, tied them together, set them on fire and floated them down towards the aggressor ship, so that the ship was set on fire and sank.
					
					 After the sinking of the "General Sherman", the U.S. imperialist aggressors sent another vessel, the warship "Shenandoah" which sailed into the mouth of the River Taedong, where its crew committed murder, incendiary attacks and pillage. Kim Ung U, again, aroused the people to the struggle for smiting the enemy.
					
					 His ardent love and devotion for the country and the people are illustrated by the fact that he mobilized even the government army, to say nothing of the people, to the battle against the invaders without any governmental or military position.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Halt Moves for MD
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Halt Moves for MD
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The United States is advertising its missile defence system (MD) as a "shield" for warding off "attack" not as a spear for hurting others in a bid to justify its frantic moves to establish the MD. This is, however, sheer sophism. Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes this in a signed article. 
					 It goes on: 
					
					  The moves stepped up by the U.S. to build missile shields are aimed to dominate the world by dint of military edge. 
					
					 It is the invariable strategic goal and wild ambition of the U.S. to put the world under its control and domination. 
					
					 The U.S. adopted a new strategy for preemptive strike as a national policy and is keen to use the MD for carrying it out. 
					
					 The U.S. MD is linked with its scenario for world supremacy. This is proved by the fact that it unilaterally pulled out of the ABM Treaty. 
					
					 Accordingly, the U.S. is pushing forward the moves for the MD in real earnest, not bound to international law. 
					
					 The U.S. talk about "military threat" from other countries is nothing but rhetoric intended to play down the criminal nature of its MD and justify it. 
					
					  The U.S. imperialists are so vociferously calling for building missile shields in a bid to contain independent countries and big powers and hold world hegemony by dint of nuclear superiority. 
					
					 The U.S. seeks to further expand its military bloc for aggression through the MD. 
					
					 It is their intention to build missile shields under the pretext of "threat" from the DPRK and other anti-U.S. and independent countries. 
					
					  By stepping up the moves to establish the MD under the pretence of "threat" from the DPRK the U.S. seeks to pose increased military threat to it and mount a preemptive missile attack on it any moment and thus stifle it. 
					
					 It is working hard to plug various countries into an arms race under the motto of building missile shields. This is intended to contain the "potential enemies" with ease by wearing down their strength. 
					
					 The above-said moves for MD are sparking off a new Cold War and straining the international situation. 
					
					 It is an anachronistic daydream for the U.S. to try to realize its wild ambition for world domination by building a global network of missile shields.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today dedicates a signed article to the 13th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" (October 2, 1995).
					 He in the work comprehensively clarified the immortal feats President Kim Il Sung performed by enunciating the idea and theory of building a Juche-oriented party and strengthening and developing the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party, and indicated tasks to be fulfilled to glorify the WPK as the eternal party of Kim Il Sung and ways to do so. 
					
					 It is the precious fruition of the energetic leadership provided by Kim Jong Il that the WPK has confidently pushed forward the building of a great prosperous powerful nation the way the President did under the uplifted banner of Songun, true to the idea and the cause of the President, says the article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The immortal feats Kim Jong Il has performed in the efforts to accomplish the President's cause of building the party lies in that he has glorified the revolutionary idea of the President as the eternal guiding idea of the WPK, developed in depth the work to establish the system of the party leadership to ensure that his revolutionary cause is firmly upheld and preserved and carried forward and accomplished with loyalty and successfully embodied the President's idea of believing in people as in Heaven to cement the harmonious whole of the WPK and the people in every way.
					
					 The WPK will always shed its rays as the party of Kim Il Sung and record an ever-victorious history under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, the Songun brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu and a great master building the revolutionary party, the article stresses.

articles.title: Crackdown upon Reunification Movement Organizations Flailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Crackdown upon Reunification Movement Organizations Flailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Youth and student organizations in south Korea made public statements urging the puppet authorities to immediately stop the crackdown upon reunification movement organizations.
					 The action headquarters of the 16th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) in its statement on Oct. 1 branded the Lee Myung Bak dictatorial regime's suppression of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration as a fascist action which can never be justified.
					
					 The recent crackdown fully revealed the true colors of the regime seeking to totally scrap the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and put an end to the era of reunification, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak "government" has left no stone unturned to spread the conception of regarding the north as "the principal enemy" after cooking up the "Socialist Workers' Federation case." Not content with this, it is playing a poor trick to implant the consciousness of Cold War confrontation into the minds of the people by faking up another case of "enemy-benefiting organization." 
					
					 Branding the recent large case cooked up under the pretext of "security" as a declaration of an all-out war against the people, Hanchongryon will turn out in the struggle to deal heavy setbacks at the "government".
					
					 The Taegu and North Kyongsang Provincial Federation of University Student Councils under Hanchongryon in its statement on Sept. 29 warned that all the people would never pardon the recent action of the regime. It urged the authorities to stop the suppression of the reunification movement organizations at once.
					
					 The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, too, released a statement titled "Crackdown on the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration is declaration of war against the people" on the same day. The statement accused the security authorities of continuing to spread the wave of suppression to other reunification movement organizations.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Suppression of S. Korean Student Organization under Fire
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Suppression of S. Korean Student Organization under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration of south Korea released a statement on Sept. 29 in protest against the puppet authorities' suppression of the organization.
					 The statement accused the police of walking off the executive chairman of the solidarity on charges of "murder and threat".
					
					 This is a sheer fabrication, which indicates what extent the repressive moves of the present regime to revive fascist dictatorship have reached, the statement held, and continued:
					
					 The police's arrest of the executive chairman who waged a positive struggle for democracy in south Korea and national reunification is part of the crackdown upon the progressive forces and the movement for reunification.
					
					 The tentacles of suppression stretched by the present regime to the overall student movement are arousing serious apprehension, the statement noted, demanding the security authorities stop the reckless arrest of innocent people at once and release the arrestees without delay.

articles.title: Abolition of S. Korea-U.S. "Mutual Defense Treaty" Demanded
articles.content:
Abolition of S. Korea-U.S. "Mutual Defense Treaty" Demanded
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The emergency measure committee for frustrating the crackdown upon participants in candlelight actions, moves for scrapping the June 15 declaration and the October 4 declaration and a plot to fake up a case for suppressing the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea made public a statement in demand of the abolition of the south Korea-U.S. "mutual defense treaty" for aggression on October 1. 
					 The statement said that the south Korea-U.S. "mutual defense treaty" fabricated 55 years ago is an unequal and shackling one legalizing the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea as it is a violation of the Armistice Agreement which calls for the withdrawal of all foreign forces from south Korea and a peaceful settlement of the Korean issue.
					
					 On the strength of this "treaty," the U.S. troops enjoy extraterritorial privilege and special benefits while the south Korean people are forced to undergo sufferings and such tragic deaths as those met by Hyo Sun and Mi Son have not ceased over the past half century, the statement deplored. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The south Korean people are becoming increasingly vocal in demanding the abolition of the "treaty," but the Lee Myung Bak regime has been keen on tightening the "alliance" with the U.S. under the pretext of the "strategic alliance in the 21st century" since the very day of its appearance. 
					
					 There is no ground whatsoever for the "treaty" to exist any longer as it is obstructive to peace, prosperity and reunification and it should be, therefore, repealed.

articles.title: Implementation of October 4 Declaration Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Implementation of October 4 Declaration Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The Committee for Holding Events to Commemorate the 1st Anniversary of the October 4 Declaration formed by the progressive movement organizations including the Solidarity for Progress in south Korea held a press conference in front of the building of the puppet Ministry of Unification on Wednesday.
					 Speakers at the press conference said that the October 4 declaration indicates specific ways for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, adding that they could not but express irrepressible resentment at the Lee Myung Bak "government" pushing the inter-Korean relations to collapse in violation of the above-said historic declaration.
					
					 Accusing the present ruling forces of enforcing anti-reunification policies aimed at suspending overall undertakings for reconciliation and cooperation between the south and the north and, at the same time, mercilessly suppressing the reunification movement organizations on charges of violation of the "National Security Law," they declared the anti-reunification policy of the "government" is bound to go bankrupt. 
					
					 A press release read out there noted that the inter-Korean relations have seriously deteriorated due to the anti-reunification moves of the Lee's "government." It denounced the military authorities including the chairman of the puppet joint chiefs of staff and the "minister of National Defense" for letting a spate of outbursts calling for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The above-said organizations are strongly opposed to the Lee "government's" watchword of "No nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars," the press release said, demanding it implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as they indicate the shortcut to independent reunification and peace and prosperity. 
					
					Meanwhile, press conferences and demonstrations took place all at once in 20 places of 15 regions in south Korea on the occasion of the first anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Arms Buildup Blasted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Arms Buildup Blasted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and other civic and public organizations in south Korea held the 83rd rally for peace and disarmament outside the "Defence Ministry" building on September 30 to protest against the puppet authorities' scheme for arms buildup.
					 Speakers at the rally disclosed that at the "Cabinet meeting" on the same day the "government" shaped a military budget for 2009 which increased 7.5 per cent over this year's and decided to bring this for discussion at the "National Assembly" soon.
					
					 Noting that one third of the military budget is to be spent for the tightened "alliance" with the U.S., they held that such spending should be cut down.
					
					 A resolution was read out at the rally, which said: Included in this budget are such items as "introduction of new high-performance weapon system for preemptive strike at the north". In the long run, the authorities' arms buildup is designed to meet the U.S. interests and the purpose of its military strategy and tighten the "alliance" for aggression.
					
					 Such scheme for arms buildup should be dropped at once as it disregards the sufferings that the people are undergoing due to the economic difficulties and runs counter to the peace process, it contended.

articles.title: Abolition of NSL Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Abolition of NSL Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Council of Youth Organizations called a press conference in Seoul on Sept. 30 at which it declared it would intensify the struggle for the abrogation of the "National Security Law".
					 A press release read out at the conference recalled that at the final trial held on Sept. 25 the judicial authorities defined the council as an "enemy-benefiting organization" and inflicted punishment on former Chairman Jon Sang Bong and other core members of the organization on charges of "violation" of the ill-famed NSL.
					
					 The recent trial clearly showed how the authorities have abused the NSL and how desperately they are working to destroy the civic and public organizations, it noted, and continued:
					
					 The council would bring a final appeal in the Supreme Court, refusing to accept the said labeling and punishment made at the trial and all its members would struggle to get the evil law abrogated.
					
					 Then, solidarity speeches were made at the rally by the secretary general of the Catholic Human Rights Committee, the permanent co-representative of the Solidarity for Progress and the executive chairman of the Youth and Student Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration.
					
					 Meanwhile, the defence counsel of the council made sure that the final appeal was accepted by the Supreme Court on Sept. 29.

articles.title: Anniversaries of DPRK and WPK Marked in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Anniversaries of DPRK and WPK Marked in Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Prague of the Czech Republic on Sept. 27 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the foundation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the 63rd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there were personages of the Czech Parliament, the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia and the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and other people.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to the Czech Republic and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 Jaroslav Kafka, chairman of the Paektusan Czech－Korean Friendship Association, said that the DPRK is a country where all the people are single-mindedly united, adding that the Korean people and the world progressive people significantly celebrated the 60th birthday of the DPRK and would greet the 63rd anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 Jiri Jarka, honorary chairman of the above-said association, referred to the fact that the DPRK has been built into the country for people under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, noting that the President built the DPRK into a powerful socialist state independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence and Kim Jong Il has aroused the entire party and army and all the people to the general advance for the Songun revolution and wisely led the cause of national reunification.
					
					 He expressed belief that thanks to Kim Jong Il's Songun politics the DPRK would emerge a prosperous socialist power in the near future.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: October 4 Declaration Hailed by Indonesian Figure
articles.content:
October 4 Declaration Hailed by Indonesian Figure
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Marine Transport Workers Union of Indonesia released a statement on September 24 on the occasion of the first anniversary of the adoption of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 Noting that the Korean people regard the October 4 declaration as a programme for implementing the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, the statement said that the June 15 declaration calls for independently settling the issue of reunification of Korea in the idea of "By our nation itself" free from any outside interference.
					
					 After the publication of the joint declaration the inter-Korean relations turned into those of dialogue, cooperation and exchange from those of antagonism and confrontation, bringing about progress inconceivable in the past, the statement recalled, expressing concern about the hurdles now lying in the way of the north-south relations.
					
					 It expressed belief that the north and the south of Korea would achieve peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula by implementing the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration to the letter in the idea of "By our nation itself" and attain the reunification of the country, the cherished desire of the Korean people, without fail.

articles.title: Events Held in Various Countries to Mark WPK Birthday
articles.content:
Events Held in Various Countries to Mark WPK Birthday
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held by the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa and the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, a lecture by a branch in Pretoria City of the African National Congress of South Africa and a photo exhibition and a film show by a Singaporean company in the period from Sept. 25 to 27 to mark the 63rd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 On display in the venues of the events were famous works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photos showing the immortal exploits performed by them in building and leading the WPK and photos introducing the fighting efficiency of the Party.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa said in a speech that the WPK has advanced along the straight road of victory as it was founded and strengthened by Kim Il Sung and its history and tradition have been given steady continuity by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Ramon Jimenez Lopez, president of the Mexican committee, explained that the WPK has creditably discharged its mission as the guide of the cause of Songun under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of a branch in Pretoria City of the African National Congress of South Africa said that the WPK realized the single-minded unity of the whole society for the first time in history. The WPK will always emerge victorious and the DPRK's cause of socialism will more dynamically advance as long as there is leadership of Kim Jong Il, he added.
					
					 The participants of the film show watched a Korean film showing the might of the WPK.
					
					 Meanwhile, a meeting was held and a book, photo and handicraft exhibition opened with due ceremony in Poland on Sept. 15 to mark the 63rd anniversary of the WPK and the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Poland.

articles.title: DPRK Founding Anniversary Celebrated
articles.content:
DPRK Founding Anniversary Celebrated
  Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place in London and Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions in Nigeria, Bulgaria, Russia and Iran between Sept. 5 and 30 to celebrate the 60th birthday of the DPRK.
					 At the seminar, Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, made a report on the glorious six decades of the DPRK which has developed under the banner of Juche and Songun.
					
					 The DPRK has become a cradle of happiness for the Korean people and the genuine motherland of the Korean nation, the reporter said, adding that this is the fruition of the immortal feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Shawn Pikford, secretary general of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, and other speakers noted that the historical root of the people's power in Korea was provided in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and the DPRK has been guided by the Juche idea. And they expressed resolution to intensify the study and dissemination of the Juche idea and activities for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people.
					
					 Displayed in the exhibition halls were famous works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photographs showing their immortal feats, books and photographs introducing the 60-year-long history of Songun Korea, which has advanced along the road of victory and glory, and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Il Sung Lauded
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Il Sung Lauded
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung is the distinguished leader who founded the invincible Workers' Party of Korea, said Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania who visited the DPRK, in an interview with KCNA.
					 Referring to the fact that Kim Il Sung devoted great pains to found the revolutionary party under the complicated situation right after the liberation of the country, he said: Under the distinguished and seasoned leadership of the President the WPK developed into an invincible party which is strong in the revolutionary character and sense of organization and discipline and enjoys absolute support and trust of the popular masses.
					
					 Hammer, sickle and writing brush inscribed on the emblem of the party clearly show that the WPK is a revolutionary party of the working class and a mass party of the working people, he said, adding:
					
					 Guided by the great leader and the great party, the Korean people could work world-startling miracles one after another and build a socialist power shining with independence.
					
					 The progressive political parties of the world aspiring after socialism look up to the WPK as a beacon of hope.
					
					 All successes achieved in the DPRK under the leadership of the Party have given strength and encouragement to the world's progressive people struggling for a new society.
					
					 Today the WPK has further strengthened and developed into an ever-victorious party thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people will as ever make greater success in building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation with firm confidence in sure victory, rallied closer around the great Party.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a abrir nueva epoca
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a abrir nueva epoca
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ATCC) -- En el editorial publicado este sabado con motivo del primer aniversario de la publicacion de la "Declaracion para el Desarrollo de las Relaciones Norte-Sur, la Paz y la Prosperidad", el rotativo Rodong Sinmun califico la aprobacion de este documento en el segundo historico encuentro cumbre Norte-Sur, que tuvo lugar en octubre del ano pasado en esta capital, de evento importante que permitio impulsar la causa de reunificacion de la patria en la nueva etapa basandose en la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio.
					La aprobacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre elevo el entusiasmo por la reunificacion independiente de todos los coreanos que la aceptaron como programa comun de lucha por materializar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio. 
					
					De esta manera, abrio amplias posibilidades de lograr el desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur, la paz en la Peninsula Coreana, la coprosperidad y la reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					De ahi la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre devino la bandera eterna que ilumino claramente el camino de la lucha de la nacion coreana por la materializacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, gran programa comun de la nacion para la reunificacion de la patria, y permitio otro gran salto en la causa para lograrla.
					
					Ahora, se tornan mas siniestras que nunca las maniobras de EE.UU. y su satelite banda de Lee Myung Bak, que se oponen a la unidad y la reunificacion de nuestra nacion.
					
					EE.UU. practica de continuo su anacronica politica hostil a la RPDC sin tomar en cuenta la aspiracion y la demanda de la nacion coreana sobre la reunificacion de la patria y agrava la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana desplegando incesantemente en el Sur de Corea los ejercicios belicos de gran tamano contra la segunda.
					
					Debido a las maquinaciones antinacionales de la banda de Lee Myung Bak, que desprecia dichas declaraciones Norte-Sur y rehusa su ejecucion, interrumpieron los dialogos y las labores de cooperacion entre ambas partes mientras las relaciones bilaterales cayeron en la peor fase desde la adopcion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio en 2000.
					
					La posicion y actitud sobre las declaraciones intercoreanas son la pauta que separa a los patriotas, pacifistas y partidarios de reunificacion de los traidores, belicistas y divisionistas.
					
					Todos los coreanos deben desplegar con audacia la lucha por acabar con la anacronica politica hostil a la RPDC de EE.UU., que frena la causa de la reunificacion independiente y amenaza gravemente la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, y deben detener y frustrar el establecimiento de la dictadura fascista por parte del traidor Lee Myung Bak y sus maniobras de enfrentamiento en contra de reunificacion.

articles.title: ATCC comenta actos anti-reunificacion de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
ATCC comenta actos anti-reunificacion de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ATCC) -- La banda de traidores al mando de Lee Myung Bak niega totalmente la ejecucion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y el programa de su materializacion, Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, y lleva a la confrontacion las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					La segunda plantea de modo comprensivo todos los problemas para desarrollar las relaciones intercoreanas conforme al espiritu de la primera declaracion y para lograr la paz del pais y la coprosperidad nacional.
					
					Ante todo, la banda de Lee viola gravemente el espiritu de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" estipulado en la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					Desde el principio, ellos formularon como una politica la solucion de las relaciones intercoreanas "no con la pauta del ideal sino con la de pragmatismo" y se atrevieron a calificar el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" de "nacionalismo chovinista e inflexible".
					
					Esto constituye un grave acto criminal para desvirtuar el espiritu de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" que se enraizo firmemente despues del 15 de junio en el corazon de los coreanos como ideal comun nacional por encima de las ideas y regimenes.
					
					La banda del traidor Lee desafio abiertamente a la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre en que estan mencionados los problemas concretos para intensificar la cooperacion e intercambio multilaterales entre el Norte y el Sur encaminados a la coprosperidad nacional.
					
					Desde el comienzo de su mandato, las autoridades titeres surcoreanas procedieron a cerrar la puerta de las relaciones intercoreanas, que se desarrollaban positivamente despues del 15 de junio, presentando los llamados "4 principios para el fomento de la politica al Norte".
					
					Suspendieron la implementacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, apoyada absolutamente por toda la nacion coreana, diciendo que no conviene a los "intereses estatales" ni a las "razones economicas" y significa una "carga financiera".
					
					Ademas, al insistir en que la exigencia de la "ejecucion incondicional de las declaraciones mencionadas" es "irracional", justifican abiertamente su posicion en contra de esta labor difundiendo un rumor de que "ella requiere fabulosos fondos".
					
					La negativa total a los exitos logrados en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria y el desaliento del deseo nacional de solucionar independientemente este problema son intolerables actos divisionistas.
					
					El "poder" surcoreano lleva al extremo la confrontacion militar entre el Norte y el Sur desafiando a la declaracion de octubre que presenta las realistas medidas para superar mediante el dialogo y las negociaciones los obstaculos en el camino a la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Introdujo en el terreno surcoreano el portaaviones nuclear de tamano ultragrande, submarinos nucleares y otros ultramodernos equipos para la guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y definio a los compatriotas como "enemigo principal".
					
					Desplego con las fuerzas extranjeras los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve", "Aguilucho" y "Ulji Freedom Guardian", que toman por su blanco a los compatriotas.
					
					El alboroto de confrontacion militar de la banda de Lee es peligroso acto para impedir el avance de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio mediante el empeoramiento al tope de las relaciones entre las dos partes coreanas y desatar a cualquier precio la guerra de agresion junto con las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					Ahora, las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas hablan aparentemente de la "convivencia y coprosperidad" y de la "reconciliacion y cooperacion" con el Norte.
					
					Hace unos dias, hablaron tanto del "dialogo global" como si estuvieran interesados en la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas empeoradas y en el desarrollo de la cooperacion y el intercambio.
					
					Pero, la realidad demuestra que ellas no quieren el desarrollo de las relaciones intercoreanas ni la paz ni la prosperidad sino persiguen la confrontacion y la tension y maniobran desesperadamente para aplastar a la RPDC junto con las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					La camarilla traidora de Lee persigue tenazmente la confrontacion entre las ideas, ideales y regimenes de las dos partes coreanas exigiendo "cambios" y cuestionando los "derechos humanos".
					
					Ella libra una intensa campana de liquidacion de las fuerzas progresistas pro-reunificacion para sofocar el animo de los habitantes surcoreanos de reunificar el pais en alianza con el Norte e inculcar en ellos el sentimiento de confrontacion con este.
					
					En particular, se libra en toda la extension surcoreana la represion a la Solidaridad de Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Sur-Norte, entidad del movimiento por la reunificacion que vino actuando para materializarla despues de su publicacion.
					
					Esta represion constituye una revelacion abierta del intento del "poder" de Lee de quebrar las relaciones y las declaraciones intercoreanas mediante la eliminacion de las fuerzas que las apoyan y tratan de ejecutarlas.
					
					Todos los hechos estan relacionados directamente con las maniobras de confrontacion de caracter antinacional y anti-reunificacion de la camarilla titere surcoreana que obstaculiza la ejecucion de todos los acuerdos Norte-Sur provenientes de la historica Declaracion.
					
					Ambas declaraciones son los documentos nacionales de nivel supremo para la reunificacion, cuya justeza y vitalidad fueron comprobadas patentemente.
					
					No hay nada que pueda sustituirlas en la causa para lograr el desarrollo de las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Si se hubiera cumplido con sinceridad los requisitos de ellas, hoy se habria alcanzado grandes exitos en el desarrollo de las relaciones intercoreanas y el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria, de lo cual se habria beneficiado practicamente toda la nacion coreana.
					
					La horda de Lee cometio un grave crimen antinacional y anti-reunificacion al restar la importancia historica de las declaraciones intercoreanas y rehusar su implementacion.
					
					El "poder" de Lee, que traiciono a la nacion, sera castigado duro por la historia.

articles.title: ATCC comenta sofisterias de So Jae Jin
articles.content:
ATCC comenta sofisterias de So Jae Jin
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ATCC) -- En estos dias, pasan el limite de peligro las maniobras de las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas para llevar las relaciones Norte-Sur a la fase de agudo enfrentamiento.
					So Jae Jin, presidente del Instituto de Reunificacion titere hablo de la "teoria de inutilidad" del dialogo Norte-Sur en un seminario celebrado el 23 de septiembre en la Universidad de Seul.
					
					Lo rechazamos tajantemente como negacion total a las negociaciones Norte-Sur y abierta declaracion de enfrentamiento.
					
					  El dialogo Norte-Sur es necesario para eliminar el malentendido y desconfianza entre ambas partes de Corea y fomentar la unidad nacional mediante la concesion y conciliacion reciprocas dejando atras las diferencias de ambas partes.
					
					  Solo cuando ambas partes presenten la reunificacion del pais como apremiante tarea nacional y dispongan de la posicion de realizarla por via pacifica en  vez de la guerra, se necesitan las conversaciones y hay el significado de realizarlas.
					
					  Las palabras de So demuestran que el mismo "presidente del Instituto de Reunificacion" es el elemento anti-reunificacion que no toma en consideracion la reintegracion del pais sino persigue solo el enfrentamiento. 
					
					  El hablo tambien de la "reforma" y "apertura".
					
					  Ahora, en el Norte y el Sur de Corea existen diferentes regimenes. Ninguna parte quiere conceder voluntariamente su sistema a la otra. En esta circunstancia sera inevitable la confrontacion en caso de que una parte imponga a la otra la "reforma" y la "apertura".
					
					  Esto demuestra que estas no pasan de ser, en su esencia, una variedad de la teoria de "reunificacion mediante la absorcion" con que salieron los anteriores elementos anti-reunificacion, la que quedo fracasada.
					
					  No podemos perdonar jamas a So que insulto nuestro sagrado sistema politico y la politica de Songun (priorizacion militar) del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC).
					
					  La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es el autentico regimen socialista centrado en las masas populares donde las masas del pueblo trabajador son verdaderas duenas del Estado y la sociedad y lo todo de la sociedad sirve para estas.
					
					  Y la gran politica de Songun defiende con firmeza el socialismo, que es pilar del alma y cuna de la vida para nuestro pueblo, desde las maniobras de todos los enemigos encaminadas a agredirlo y aplastarlo.
					
					  Sin embargo, So acuso arbitrariamente nuestro sistema politico y la politica de Songun. No podemos menos de dudar que tal tipejo se ocupe del "presidente del Instituto de Reunificacion".
					
					  Despues de que la banda de Lee Myung Bak tomo el poder en el Sur de Corea, las fuerzas conservadoras vienen desacreditando a nuestro sistema politico.
					
					  Pero, no hubo nunca tal elemento como So Jae Jin que lanza directamente maldiciones sobre nuestro sistema y metodo politicos y nuestra unidad monolitica.
					
					  Hasta los medios de prensa del Sur de Corea expresaron preocupaciones de que los disparates de ese tipejo seran una nueva mecha para destruir las relaciones con el Norte.
					
					  En la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio el no podia aparecer en la escena politica por ser calificado del hombre politicamente inexperto, idiota y peor elemento anti-reunificacion.
					
					  Pero, tal tipejo se atrevio a denigrar imprudentemente a nuestro sistema politico, lo cual  partio de vil intento de mantener a toda costa el ultimo puesto adquirido a duras penas en el "poder" titere de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					  Volvemos a dar enfasis en que es imposible perdonar jamas la calumnia y difamacion sobre nuestra Direccion Suprema que goza de absoluta confianza de todo el pueblo y sobre el precioso regimen popular.
					
					  No perdonaremos jamas a los que denigran el digno sistema politico de la RPDC y el mundo espiritual de nuestro pueblo de defender a costa de la vida al Lider.

articles.title: Se inicia reconstruccion de ferrovia Rajin-Hasan y puerto de Rajin
articles.content:
Se inicia reconstruccion de ferrovia Rajin-Hasan y puerto de Rajin
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 ante el Pabellon de Amistad Corea-Rusia en la zona de la estacion Tumangang de esta ciudad una ceremonia para dar inicio a la obra de reconstruccion de la ferrovia Rajin-Hasan y el puerto de Rajin.
					Estuvieron presentes el ministro del Ferrocarril Jon Kil Su, el vicecanciller Kung Sok Ung, el viceministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Myong San, funcionarios de la rama ferroviaria y trabajadores de esta ciudad. 
					
					Tambien participaron la delegacion de la Compania "Ferrocarril de Rusia" S.A. presidida por su director general Vladimir Yakunin, el gobernador administrativo del territorio litoral de la Federacion Rusa Serguei Darikin, el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores Alexei Borodapkin, funcionarios relacionados con la rama ferroviaria y otros huespedes rusos, el embajador ruso Valery Sukhinin y los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, acreditados en Corea.
					
					  Al usar primero la palabra, V. Yakunin dijo que el proyecto de reconstruccion de la ferrovia Rajin-Hasan, acordado en 2001 en la historica cumbre Rusia-Corea, entra por fin en la etapa de practica gracias a la cooperacion activa de los funcionarios ferroviarios. 
					
					  Se refirio a que esta centrando la atencion de varios paises esta etapa piloto del gran proyecto para empalmar el ferrocarril trans-siberiano y el que atraviesa el territorio coreano.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que los organos correspondientes de los dos paises terminaran esta obra en un corto tiempo al seguir consolidando en lo adelante tambien la cooperacion de beneficio mutuo. 
					
					  El ministro coreano del Ferrocarril Jon Kil Su, en su discurso, dijo que tiene importante significado esta ceremonia inaugural que se realiza en visperas del 60o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre la RPDC y la Federacion Rusa.
					
					  El tramo entre Rajin y Hasan -afirmo- sera la via de transporte terrestre de amistad, que contribuira en conjunto a la economia y al transporte de los dos paises y al fomento del bienestar de los dos pueblos y tiene buenas perspectivas de desarrollarse en una magnifica linea para asegurar el transporte internacional entre Asia y Europa.
					
					  Pronunciaron las palabras congratulatorias el vicecanciller ruso Alexei Borodapkin y el gobernador administrativo del territorio litoral Serguei Darikin. 
					
					  Acto seguido, se dio inicio a la construccion del primer ferrocarril mixto y fue develado el monumento a la ceremonia inaugural de la obra.
					
					Ese dia el gobierno de la RPDC ofrecio el banquete en relacion con el inicio de la obra mencionada.

articles.title: Nombrado embajador coreano en Singapur

Nombrado embajador coreano en Singapur
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ATCC) -- Segun el decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fue nombrado Jong Song Il como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario coreano a acreditarse en la Republica de Singapur.
